attributes.action: Establish a regulatory and licensing framework for developers of new build homes
attributes.additional_details: A home is the most expensive purchase that most of us will make in our lives, and yet developers are able to get away with providing sub-standard and even dangerous accommodation, and still continue on to new projects, whilst the new home owner is left at the developer's mercy as to whether they will fix it.
attributes.background: To create a governing body that licences and regulates developers. They could require certain qualifications to gain a licence. Licences could be revoked for consistent poor building and poor practices (such as not fixing issues). Additional regulation could also hold bad developers accountable.

departments.name: Ministry of Housing, Communities and Local Government
